q1: Barcelona is doing great. DO you think they will take the world cup?
a1: Bacelona do not play in the World Cup, Spain do.
q2: Oh, I though Barcelona was Spain, my bad.

a3: They have a good chance every season
q4: What is the difference between Barcelona and Spain? Are they in different leagues? Comparable to like a major league and a minor league set-up? I don't understand soccer so I am unaware.

a5: Barca are a club, spain are a country
